TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ZipFileExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class ZipFileExtensions abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供 和 類別的擴充方法。

span.span: Provides extension methods for the and classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別僅包含靜態方法，擴充和類別。The class contains only static methods that extend the and classes. 您未建立的執行個體類別; 相反地，您可以使用這些方法的執行個體或。You do not create an instance of the class; instead, you use these methods from instances of or . 若要使用的擴充方法，您必須參考`System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`專案中的組件。To use the extension methods, you must reference the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly in your project. `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`組件不適用於[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]應用程式。The `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly is not available in [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps. 因此，並類別 (這兩者都是在`System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`組件) 中未提供[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]應用程式。Therefore, the and classes (both of which are in the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly) are not available in [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps. 在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]應用程式，使用中的方法使用的壓縮檔案， ， ，和。In [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps, you work with compressed files by using the methods in , , , and . 類別包含三個方法來擴充:The class contains three methods that extend : - - - 類別包含兩個方法，擴充:The class contains two methods that extend : - - ## Examples 下列範例示範如何從現有的檔案，zip 封存中建立新的項目，並將解壓縮目錄之封存的內容。The following example shows how to create a new entry in a zip archive from an existing file, and extract the contents of the archive to a directory. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program3.vb#3)] 下列範例示範如何逐一查看的 zip 封存的內容，並將副檔名為.txt 的檔案解壓縮。The following example shows how to iterate through the contents of a zip archive and extract files that have a .txt extension. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 透過將檔案壓縮並加入至 zip 封存的方式進行封存。

span.span: Archives a file by compressing it and adding it to the zip archive.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry CreateEntryFromFile (this System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive destination, string sourceFileName, string entryName);

.method public static hidebysig class System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry CreateEntryFromFile(class System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive destination, string sourceFileName, string entryName) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function CreateEntryFromFile (destination As ZipArchive, sourceFileName As String, entryName As String) As ZipArchiveEntry
static member CreateEntryFromFile : System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive * string * string -> System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry

param.name: destination
param.span: 要將檔案加入至其中的 Zip 封存。

span.span: The zip archive to add the file to.

param.name: sourceFileName
param.span: 要封存的檔案之路徑。

span.span: The path to the file to be archived.

param.span: 您可以指定相對或相對路徑。

span.span: You can specify either a relative or an absolute path.

param.span: 相對路徑會解譯為與目前的工作目錄相對。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

param.name: entryName
param.span: 要在 Zip 封存中建立之項目的名稱。

span.span: The name of the entry to create in the zip archive.

summary.span: 透過將檔案壓縮並加入至 zip 封存的方式進行封存。

span.span: Archives a file by compressing it and adding it to the zip archive.

returns.span: zip 封存中之新項目的包裝函式。

span.span: A wrapper for the new entry in the zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在封存中的新項目會包含所指定的檔案內容`sourceFileName`。The new entry in the archive contains the contents of the file specified by `sourceFileName`. 如果具有指定名稱的項目 (`entryName`) 已經存在在封存中，第二個項目會建立具有相同的名稱。If an entry with the specified name (`entryName`) already exists in the archive, a second entry is created with an identical name. 項目的屬性設定為檔案系統上的檔案已變更的最後一次。The property of the entry is set to the last time the file on the file system was changed. 當`ZipArchiveMode.Update`存在，項目的大小限制僅限於。When `ZipArchiveMode.Update` is present, the size limit of an entry is limited to . 這項限制是因為更新模式會使用在內部以允許更新讓封存檔時，所需的搜尋和整數的大小上限等於This limit is because update mode uses a internally to allow the seeking required when updating an archive, and has a maximum equal to the size of an int. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何從現有的檔案之 zip 封存中建立新的項目。The following example shows how to create a new entry in a zip archive from an existing file. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program3.vb#3)]

specifies a directory.

summary.span: 透過將檔案以指定之壓縮等級壓縮並加入至 zip 封存的方式進行封存。

span.span: Archives a file by compressing it using the specified compression level and adding it to the zip archive.

returns.span: zip 封存中之新項目的包裝函式。

span.span: A wrapper for the new entry in the zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在封存中的新項目會包含所指定的檔案內容`sourceFileName`。The new entry in the archive contains the contents of the file specified by `sourceFileName`. 如果具有指定名稱的項目 (`entryName`) 已經存在在封存中，第二個項目會建立具有相同的名稱。If an entry with the specified name (`entryName`) already exists in the archive, a second entry is created with an identical name. 項目的屬性設定為檔案系統上的檔案已變更的最後一次。The property of the entry is set to the last time the file on the file system was changed. 當`ZipArchiveMode.Update`存在，項目的大小限制僅限於。When `ZipArchiveMode.Update` is present, the size limit of an entry is limited to . 這項限制是因為更新模式會使用在內部以允許更新讓封存檔時，所需的搜尋和整數的大小上限等於This limit is because update mode uses a internally to allow the seeking required when updating an archive, and has a maximum equal to the size of an int. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何從現有的檔案，zip 封存中建立新的項目和指定的壓縮層級。The following example shows how to create a new entry in a zip archive from an existing file, and specify the compression level. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program4.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program4.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ExtractToDirectory (this System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive source, string destinationDirectoryName);
.method public static hidebysig void ExtractToDirectory(class System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive source, string destinationDirectoryName) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Sub ExtractToDirectory (source As ZipArchive, destinationDirectoryName As String)
static member ExtractToDirectory : System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive * string -> unit

param.name: source
param.span: 做為檔案解壓縮來源的 zip 封存。

span.span: The zip archive to extract files from.

param.name: destinationDirectoryName
param.span: 要在其中放置解壓縮檔案的目錄路徑。

span.span: The path to the directory to place the extracted files in.

param.span: 您可以指定相對或相對路徑。

span.span: You can specify either a relative or an absolute path.

param.span: 相對路徑會解譯為與目前的工作目錄相對。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

summary.span: 將 zip 封存中的所有檔案解壓縮到檔案系統上的目錄。

span.span: Extracts all the files in the zip archive to a directory on the file system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建立所指定的目錄`destinationDirectoryName`。This method creates the directory specified by `destinationDirectoryName`. 如果目的地目錄已經存在，這個方法不能覆寫它;它會擲回例外狀況。If the destination directory already exists, this method does not overwrite it; it throws an exception. 此方法也會建立反映階層 zip 封存中的子目錄。The method also creates subdirectories that reflect the hierarchy in the zip archive. 如果在擷取期間發生錯誤，封存會保留部分擷取。If an error occurs during extraction, the archive remains partially extracted. 每個已解壓縮的檔案具有相同的相對路徑所指定的目錄`destinationDirectoryName`做為其來源項目都有封存的根目錄。Each extracted file has the same relative path to the directory specified by `destinationDirectoryName` as its source entry has to the root of the archive. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何從現有的檔案，zip 封存中建立新的項目，並將解壓縮封存至新的目錄。The following example shows how to create a new entry in a zip archive from an existing file, and extract the archive to a new directory. 編譯器才能在此範例中，您必須參考`System.IO.Compression`和`System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`專案中的組件。In order to compiler this code example, you must reference the `System.IO.Compression` and `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assemblies in your project. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program3.vb#3)]

exception.span: 為 ，只含有空白字元，或者含有至少一個無效字元。

is .

span.span: The specified path is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
The directory specified by already exists.
-or-

exception.span: 封存檔中的項目名稱是，只包含空白字元，或包含至少一個無效的字元。

span.span: The name of an entry in the archive is , contains only white space, or contains at least one invalid character.
-or-

exception.span: 從封存解壓縮封存項目會建立 所指定目錄外的檔案。

span.span: Extracting an entry from the archive would create a file that is outside the directory specified by .

exception.span: (例如，如果項目名稱包含父目錄存取子，這就可能發生)。

span.span: (For example, this might happen if the entry name contains parent directory accessors.)
-or-

exception.span: 在封存中兩個或多個項目具有相同的名稱。

span.span: Two or more entries in the archive have the same name.

exception.span: 呼叫端不具有寫入目的地目錄的必要權限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission to write to the destination directory.
contains an invalid format.

exception.span: 找不到封存項目，或是其已損毀。

span.span: An archive entry cannot be found or is corrupt.
-or-

exception.span: 封存項目使用不支援的壓縮方法加以壓縮。

span.span: An archive entry was compressed by using a compression method that is not supported.

summary.span: 將 zip 封存中的項目解壓縮至檔案。

span.span: Extracts an entry in the zip archive to a file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目的地檔案已經存在，這個方法不能覆寫它;它會擲回例外狀況。If the destination file already exists, this method does not overwrite it; it throws an exception. 若要覆寫現有的檔案，請使用改用方法多載。To overwrite an existing file, use the method overload instead. 檔案上次寫入時間設定為 上次變更 zip 封存中的項目;這個值會儲存在屬性。The last write time of the file is set to the last time the entry in the zip archive was changed; this value is stored in the property. 您無法使用這個方法來擷取目錄中;使用方法改為。You cannot use this method to extract a directory; use the method instead. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何逐一查看的 zip 封存檔案內容，並將副檔名為.txt 的檔案解壓縮。The following example shows how to iterate through the contents of a zip archive file and extract files that have a .txt extension. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 將 zip 封存中的項目解壓縮至檔案，並選擇性覆寫名稱相同的現有檔案。

span.span: Extracts an entry in the zip archive to a file, and optionally overwrites an existing file that has the same name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檔案上次寫入時間設定為 上次變更 zip 封存中的項目;這個值會儲存在屬性。The last write time of the file is set to the last time the entry in the zip archive was changed; this value is stored in the property. 您無法使用這個方法來擷取目錄中;使用方法改為。You cannot use this method to extract a directory; use the method instead. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何逐一查看的 zip 封存檔，內容和解壓縮副檔名為.txt 的檔案。The following example shows how to iterate through the contents of a zip archive file, and extract files that have a .txt extension. 它會覆寫現有的檔案具有相同名稱的目的地資料夾中。It overwrites an existing file that has the same name in the destination folder. 編譯器才能在此範例中，您必須參考`System.IO.Compression`和`System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`專案中的組件。In order to compiler this code example, you must reference the `System.IO.Compression` and `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assemblies in your project. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program2.vb#2)]

exception.span: 為零長度字串，只包含空格，或包含一或多個如 所定義的無效字元。

span.span: is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters as defined by .

specifies a directory.
is .

exception.span: 指定的路徑、檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

span.span: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.

exception.span: 指定的路徑無效 (例如，它位於未對應的磁碟機上)。

span.span: The specified path is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
already exists and is .
-or-
An I/O error occurred.

exception.span: 項目目前已開啟以進行寫入。

span.span: The entry is currently open for writing.
-or-

exception.span: 項目已經從封存中刪除。

span.span: The entry has been deleted from the archive.

exception.span: 呼叫端沒有所需的使用權限來建立新檔。

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission to create the new file.

exception.span: 此項目可能是從封存中遺失，或已損毀且無法讀取。

span.span: The entry is missing from the archive or is corrupt and cannot be read.
-or-

exception.span: 藉由使用不支援的壓縮方法壓縮了項目。

span.span: The entry has been compressed by using a compression method that is not supported.

exception.span: 這個項目所屬的 Zip 封存已經過處置。

span.span: The zip archive that this entry belongs to has been disposed.
is in an invalid format.
-or-

exception.span: 這個項目的 Zip 封存的開啟模式是 ，該模式不允許擷取項目。

span.span: The zip archive for this entry was opened in mode, which does not permit the retrieval of entries.
